org.jenkinsci.plugins.pipeline.modeldefi.value:
# 1. Limpar 谩rea de trabalho completamente rm -rf * .git .??* 2>/dev/null || true
# 2. Clonar reposit贸rio git clone https://github.com/Gabrielcefetzada/api-pagamento.git .
# 3. Criar Dockerfile completo cat > Dockerfile << 'EOF' FROM php:8.3-cli
# Instalar depend锚ncias RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y \ git unzip libzip-dev libsqlite3-dev \ && docker-php-ext-install zip pdo pdo_sqlite
# Instalar Composer RUN curl -sS https://getcomposer.org/installer | php \ && mv composer.phar /usr/local/bin/composer
WORKDIR /var/www/html
# Copiar c贸digo COPY . .
# Configurar Laravel e executar testes RUN php -r "file_exists('.env') || copy('.env.example', '.env');" \ && composer install -q --no-ansi --no-interaction --no-scripts --no-progress --prefer-dist \ && php artisan key:generate \ && chmod -R 777 storage bootstrap/cache \ && mkdir -p database \ && touch database/database.sqlite
CMD ["sh", "-c", "DB_CONNECTION=sqlite DB_DATABASE=/var/www/html/database/database.sqlite php artisan test"] EOF
# 4. Build da imagem Docker echo " Buildando imagem Docker..." TIMESTAMP=$(date +%s) IMAGE_NAME="laravel-test-${TIMESTAMP}" docker build -t ${IMAGE_NAME} .
echo "И Executando testes..." docker run --rm ${IMAGE_NAME}
# 5. Limpar imagem echo "Ч Limpando imagem..." docker rmi ${IMAGE_NAME} 2>/dev/null || true

execution.script:
pipeline { agent any
stages { stage('Clone and Test') { steps { sh ''' # 1. Limpar 谩rea de trabalho completamente rm -rf * .git .??* 2>/dev/null || true
# 2. Clonar reposit贸rio git clone https://github.com/Gabrielcefetzada/api-pagamento.git .
# 3. Criar Dockerfile completo cat > Dockerfile << 'EOF' FROM php:8.3-cli
# Instalar depend锚ncias RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y \\ git unzip libzip-dev libsqlite3-dev \\ && docker-php-ext-install zip pdo pdo_sqlite
# Instalar Composer RUN curl -sS https://getcomposer.org/installer | php \\ && mv composer.phar /usr/local/bin/composer
WORKDIR /var/www/html
# Copiar c贸digo COPY . .
# Configurar Laravel e executar testes RUN php -r "file_exists('.env') || copy('.env.example', '.env');" \\ && composer install -q --no-ansi --no-interaction --no-scripts --no-progress --prefer-dist \\ && php artisan key:generate \\ && chmod -R 777 storage bootstrap/cache \\ && mkdir -p database \\ && touch database/database.sqlite
CMD ["sh", "-c", "DB_CONNECTION=sqlite DB_DATABASE=/var/www/html/database/database.sqlite php artisan test"] EOF
# 4. Build da imagem Docker echo " Buildando imagem Docker..." TIMESTAMP=$(date +%s) IMAGE_NAME="laravel-test-${TIMESTAMP}" docker build -t ${IMAGE_NAME} .
echo "И Executando testes..." docker run --rm ${IMAGE_NAME}
# 5. Limpar imagem echo "Ч Limpando imagem..." docker rmi ${IMAGE_NAME} 2>/dev/null || true ''' } } } }
